title: New: Jeremiah Jae ft. Zeroh – BlackMyth (produced by Kutmah)
body:
Brainfeeder rapper **Jeremiah Jae** is set to release a track a day for the next 10 days, not a bad start to the New Year, all this is part of his _Black Jungle Radio_ series.

The first is soulful little jam, _BlackMyth_, a minimalist and vaguely demonic piece of music, with **Kumah** on production duty. Pretty excited for the forthcoming tracks.

The first is soulful little jam, BlackMyth, a minimalist and vaguely demonic piece of music, with Kumah on production duty. \[…\]
